Description: Deploy a Docker-based Lambda function from ECR with read-only access to EC2, VPCs, subnets, and other infrastructure

FunctionName.Description: The name of the Lambda function.

AWSDataCollectorImageURI.Description: The URI of the CloudSibyl ECR repository

ImageTag.Description: The tag of the Docker image to use.

S3BucketName.Description: The name of the S3 bucket to which the Lambda function should have write access.

ScheduleHour.Description: The hour of day (UTC) to run the Lambda function (0-23).

EnableRDSFreeStorageSpace.Description: Enable RDS Free Storage Space metrics

EnableRDSAuroraCapacityUnits.Description: Enable Aurora Serverless v2 Capacity Units metrics

EnableCarbonFootprint.Description: Enable carbon footprint data collection on the last day of each month.

LambdaFunctionName.Description: The name of the Lambda function

LambdaFunctionArn.Description: The ARN of the Lambda function
